high_impact_articles.title: Trump and Warsh arent holding a joint press conference. What this says about the Feds next chapter.
high_impact_articles.summary: Economists have expressed surprise and disappointment about the absence of any public remarks, which had been a routine part of the Fed nomination process going back almost 30 years.

recent_articles.title: Chipotles outlook for the year casts doubt on a restaurant-industry rebound
recent_articles.summary: Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc. fell sharply after hours on Tuesday, after the fast-casual Mexican chains same-store outlook came in below expectations, and the company outlined steps it planned to take to regain growth.
